name: ha-peer

serial_no.description: Serial number of the HA member. If not specified, fetch information for all HA members

vcluster_id.description: Virtual cluster number. If not specified, fetch information for all active vclusters

GET.summary:
Get configuration of peer(s) in HA cluster. Uptime is expressed in seconds.
Access Group: sysgrp.cfg

help: Get configuration of peer(s) in HA cluster. Uptime is expressed in seconds.

serial_no.name: serial_no
serial_no.title: Serial Number
serial_no.description: Serial number of the HA peer device.

vcluster_id.name: vcluster_id
vcluster_id.title: Virtual Cluster ID
vcluster_id.description: ID number of the virtual cluster of the HA peer device.

priority.name: priority
priority.title: Priority
priority.description: Priority level of the HA peer device.

hostname.name: hostname
hostname.title: Host Name
hostname.description: Host name of the HA peer device.

master.name: master
master.title: Is Primary
master.description: True when the peer device is the HA primary.

primary.name: primary
primary.title: Is Primary
primary.description: True when the peer device is the HA primary.

response_description: Retrieve the configuration of peers for the specified member(s) of the FortiGate's HA cluster.

serial_no.name: serial_no
serial_no.summary: Serial number of the HA member. If not specified, fetch information for all HA members

vcluster_id.name: vcluster_id
vcluster_id.summary: Virtual cluster number. If not specified, fetch information for all active vclusters
